name: $predecessor
desc: Indicates that the target goal is a desired objective once the current goal is met.

name: $successor
desc: Indicates that this goal has been replaced by the target goal.

name: $replacement
desc: Indicates that the target goal is considered to be a "piece" of attaining this goal.

name: $milestone
desc: Indicates that the relationship is not covered by one of the pre-defined codes.  (An extension may convey more information about the meaning of the relationship.).
